sentence: Hi everyone, I‚Äôm Chen, the only Chinese tutor who was invited to speak at the 2024 Preply Tutor Conference, where I presented on my techniques on "Making the Chinese Classroom Fun!" name: Chen H.
sentence: Here are some examples: ÂêÉ (to eat): The left part represents a mouth, the right top is a person, and below is a table‚Äîimagine a person sitting at a table using their mouth.

sentence: It‚Äôs easy to connect this to ‚Äúto eat.‚Äù Âñù (to drink): Again, there‚Äôs a mouth on the left.
